resources.string: *Chosen for the coding bootcamp Tuwaiq 1000 along 25 developers in Dammam city to be trained on application development using kotlin language. \n *Managed to cover the Kotlin language important topics in 2 weeks. \n *Developed a full \"to do list\" app using kotlin language in 10 days.
bachelor’s degree in Electronic Commerce. \n Saudi Electronic University \n 2017–03 – 2021–11

*In-depth understanding of Mobile Application programming language and ability to build applications using Kotlin language. 
 *Active listening skills to truly hear feedback and incorporate notes effectively. 
 *Ability to think creatively and find unique solutions to problems. 
 *Strong communication skills to effectively speak with people at any level of an organization from subordinates to supervisors. 
 *Technical application support and maintenance
